bill.title: Revises provisions relating to campaign practices. (BDR 24-412)
bill.description: AN ACT relating to elections; defining the term inaugural committee; requiring an inaugural committee to report certain contributions and expenditures; requiring a candidate who is elected to a constitutional office to report certain contributions and expenditures for a certain period preceding the election and preceding the next regular legislative session; prohibiting a foreign national form making a contribution or commitment to make a contribution to an inaugural committee; and providing other matters properly relating thereto.

history.action: Made Special Order of Business for Tuesday, February 11, 2025, at 11:15 a.m..
